name: EatonBrightlayerHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on Bedroom”
”Alexa, turn on Bedroom brightness to 45 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Wi-Fi smart switches, receptacles, and dimmers from Eaton set up quickly and easily–no hubs or controllers are necessary. Schedule lights to go on and off–and even dim–to fit your daily routine. Save energy and feel more comfortable and secure. 
Eaton Smart home offers a voice-controlled smart home experience with Alexa.
Below are the steps to set up a Eaton device.
1. Download Eaton Smart Control App from Google Play store or IOS App store.
2. If you already have an account, login, else, register a new account. 
3. Go to Devices tab and click on '+' sign in top right corner and follow the prompt to commission Eaton devices.
4. Download the Alexa app from Google Play or iOS App Store, incase you already have the APP open it , and log in with your Amazon credentials.
5. From the Alexa app, select “More” then “Skills & Games” and search for the Eaton Smart Home skill.
6. Tap on “enable” and input your Eaton account login information.
7. You can then tap on “Discover devices” or ask “Alexa, discover devices”.
